content.query:
-- cipher creation event
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[cipher_creation]
(
    id varchar(50) NOT NULL,
    [date] datetime2(7) NOT NULL,
    user_id varchar(50) NULL,
    organization_id varchar(50) NULL,
    last_modified_date datetime2(7) NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (id),
    CLUSTERED INDEX (id)
)
GO

CREATE INDEX organization_id_ix ON dbo.cipher_creation (organization_id)
GO

CREATE INDEX last_modified_date_ix ON dbo.cipher_creation (last_modified_date)
GO

CREATE INDEX user_id_ix ON dbo.cipher_creation (user_id)
GO
